name: Claret Capital Partners
locations_freeform: Europe; 5th Floor Warwick House, 25 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0PP
description: Claret Capital Partners provides growth capital to innovative businesses in the technology and life science sectors, offering a less dilutive alternative to traditional equity fundraising. They have a significant track record of partnering with growth businesses and aim to be a trusted market leader in the European ecosystem by funding high-growth businesses with proven management teams in need of less dilutive capital.

investment_stages.1: Claret's 'Fund III' focuses on backing innovative businesses in the technology and life sciences sector, with plans to deploy over â‚¬500M of capital to support 50-60 companies in the next three years.

investment_verticals.2: Real Estate/PropTech, AI, Cybersecurity, Enterprise Applications, SaaS, Human Capital/HRTech, Enterprise, SMB Software, Cloud Infrastructure, Enterprise Infrastructure
investment_verticals.1: Claret invests in growth-stage technology and life science businesses throughout Europe, primarily to support organic growth and M&A.
